column4: Is there ANY easy way to perform networked backups??? I thought webmin was a gift from god untill I leanred it doesnt even work.... Any alternatives? I dont have a GUI, and dont want to learn how to use cron...
thanks, i guess ill look into that
can you chnge your nic since just typing your name won't work
well, kira is already taken. And the slash for command is the other way. Sorry, but I like this name :)
umm slash is both ways
opps, sorry, then.... I dont really want to register a new nic and stuff.
okay then.......
hmm much better now I m not on my Windows machine right now :)

you mean the thing with my name, earlier, right?

I see. Well, glad your not mad at my anymore :D
sounds like your refresh rate is set incorrectly
how would I fix this?
by changing the refresh rate to a number that you don't notice that happening on

the same way you change the resolution
